nodes.text: The podracers' hovel was a place on the planet of Tatooine where podracers came to play cards, listen to music and relax between races. Famous racers such as Sebulba, Gasgano, Ben Quadinaros and Anakin Skywalker were regular visitors of the hovel. It featured a jukebox, a wall screen with a broadcast of the Fode and Beed Show, and small stage on which dancing numbers were performed.
